Documentation.long_help: Read an Exodus II file into ParaView, reusing the memory allocated by the Exodus II library. Experimental use only.
Documentation.short_help: Experimental memory-conserving Exodus II file reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the Exodus reader.

ReaderFactory.extensions: g e ex2 ex2v2 exo gen exoII 0 00 000 0000 exii
